law.catch_line: No mining company formed or organized under any of the provisions of this article, or which has orga...
law.text: No mining company formed or organized under any of the provisions of this article, or which has organized under any existing laws, charter or act of the General Assembly of this State, shall own, conduct or carry on any store, or have any interest in any store, or receive any portion of the profits thereof; but nothing herein contained shall prevent the employees of any corporation from forming cooperative stores.
